title: Finding the Kth Prime
text:
The problem statement is really simple. There are some queries. You are to give the answers.InputAn integer stating the number of queries Q (equal to 50000), and Q lines follow, each containing one integer K between 1 and 5000000 inclusive.OutputQ lines with the answer of each query: the Kth prime number.ExampleInput:7
1
10
100
1000
10000
100000
1000000Output:2
29
541
7919
104729
1299709
15485863
